tours.title: Aquaventure Water Park
tours.description: Experience the ultimate water adventure at Dubai's premier water park!
tours.description2: Experience the ultimate water adventure at Dubai's premier water park! Your ticket includes access to all thrilling slides and rides, plus a 700-meter private beach. Please note that this booking requires payment confirmation to our bank account within 48 hours of receiving the details.

inclusions.entrance_ticket: Entrance ticket to Aquaventure Water Park
inclusions.slides_rides: Access to adventurous slides and rides
inclusions.private_beach: Access to a 700 meters private beach

important_notes.payment: This booking can only be confirmed after receiving your payment to our bank account. Bank details will be sent to your email and you have 48 hours to pay. Upon payment, you need to send the bank transfer receipt to us.

cancellation_policy.48_hours: If trip cancelled/amended 48 hrs prior to the tour date, no cancellation charges will be applicable
cancellation_policy.24_48_hours: If trip cancelled/amended within 24 to 48 hrs prior to the tour date, 50% cancellation charges will be applicable

tours.title: IMG Worlds of Adventure
tours.description: Experience the world's largest indoor theme park with 4 amazing adventure zones!
tours.description2: Experience the world's largest indoor theme park! Your ticket includes access to all 4 adventure zones: Marvel, Lost Valley, Cartoon Network, and IMG Boulevard. Please note that this booking requires payment confirmation to our bank account within 48 hours of receiving the details.

inclusions.entrance_ticket: Entrance Ticket to IMG Worlds of Adventure
inclusions.adventure_zones: Access to 4 Adventure Zones: Marvel, Lost Valley, Cartoon Network, IMG Boulevard

tours.title: Wild Wadi Park
tours.description: Experience the world's fastest and tallest water rides at Wild Wadi!
tours.description2: Experience the world's fastest and tallest water rides at Wild Wadi! Your ticket includes access to all thrilling rides and attractions suitable for all ages. Food and beverages are available on the premises.

inclusions.entrance_ticket: Entrance Ticket to Wild Wadi Theme Park
inclusions.rides: Access to World's Fastest and tallest fun rides
inclusions.all_ages: Exciting rides suitable for all ages available
inclusions.food_beverage: Food and beverage available in the premise

tours.title: Ski Dubai
tours.description: Experience the world's largest indoor ski resort in the heart of the desert!
tours.description2: Experience the world's largest indoor ski resort! Your package includes transportation, entrance ticket, and access to all snow activities including skiing, zorbing, bobsled rides, and the famous March of the Penguins show.

inclusions.transportation: Pick up from your Hotel / Location / Residence in Dubai by Toyota SUV 4x4 / Family Van with English Speaking Tour Guide
inclusions.entrance_ticket: Entrance Ticket to World Largest indoor Theme Park
inclusions.activities: Enjoy fun activities like skiing, zorbing and bobsled rides at Ski Dubai Snow Park
inclusions.super_pass: Full-day Super Pass to the Snow Park at Ski Dubai
inclusions.penguin_show: Watch the March of the Penguins, when real-life penguins walk across the snow
inclusions.chairlift: Enjoy chairlift use and set your adrenaline rushing with entry to the Giant Snowball ride and a faster bobsled
inclusions.toboggan: Ride a toboggan and zoom down the twin-track bobsled
inclusions.equipment: Voucher for Fleece Gloves and Warm clothing
